db_prefix.name: db_prefix
db_prefix.description: Prefix for the database (Elastic Index) where the results will come. To switch between dev and prod.

rank.name: rank
rank.description: Rank results by multiple field values (only numeric fields).

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Number of documents to skip from the beggining of matching documents

name.name: name
name.description: Partial or complete name of the entity.

months_summary.name: months_summary
months_summary.description: Show an additional summary of contracts, count and amount per month.

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier for entity. Format depends on endpoint: areas is ISO 3166 (for countries and states, and slug for municipalities), contracts is procedure number in source, companies, institutions, persons and sources is slug.

ids.name: ids
ids.description: Series of unique identifier for entity. Format depends on endpoint: areas is ISO 3166 (for countries and states, and slug for municipalities), contracts is procedure number in source, companies, institutions, persons and sources is slug.

ocid.name: ocid
ocid.description: Unique identifier for contract or record.

country.name: country
country.description: Country name or ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the entity.

state.name: state
state.description: State id in the from of country(2chars)-state(3chars).

city.name: city
city.description: City id in the from of country(2chars)-state(3chars)-city.

source.name: source
source.description: The name of the source from which the entity was imported.

contract_count_supplier_min.name: contract_count_supplier_min
contract_count_supplier_min.description: Minimum number of contracts in which the entity is involved as supplier.

contract_count_supplier_max.name: contract_count_supplier_max
contract_count_supplier_max.description: Maximum number of contracts in which the entity is involved as supplier.

contract_count_buyer_min.name: contract_count_buyer_min
contract_count_buyer_min.description: Minimum number of contracts in which the entity is involved as buyer.

contract_count_buyer_max.name: contract_count_buyer_max
contract_count_buyer_max.description: Maximum number of contracts in which the entity is involved as buyer.

contract_amount_supplier_min.name: contract_amount_supplier_min
contract_amount_supplier_min.description: Minimum amount sum of contracts in which the entity is involved as supplier.

contract_amount_supplier_max.name: contract_amount_supplier_max
contract_amount_supplier_max.description: Maximum amount sum of contracts in which the entity is involved as either supplier.

contract_amount_buyer_min.name: contract_amount_buyer_min
contract_amount_buyer_min.description: Minimum amount sum of contracts in which the entity is involved as buyer.

contract_amount_buyer_max.name: contract_amount_buyer_max
contract_amount_buyer_max.description: Maximum amount sum of contracts in which the entity is involved as buyer.

amount_min.name: amount_min
amount_min.description: Minimum nominal amount of the contract.

amount_max.name: amount_max
amount_max.description: Maximum nominal amount of the contract.

start_date_min.name: start_date_min
start_date_min.description: Mimimum beginning date of contract execution

start_date_max.name: start_date_max
start_date_max.description: Maximum beginning date of contract execution

supplier_name.name: supplier_name
supplier_name.description: Name of a supplier (company or person) participating in a contracting process.

party_name.name: party_name
party_name.description: Name of a party (company, person, institution or funder) participating in a contracting process.

buyer_name.name: buyer_name
buyer_name.description: Name of a buyer participating in a contracting process.

contact_point_name.name: contact_point_name
contact_point_name.description: Name of a contact point participating in a contracting process.

funder_name.name: funder_name
funder_name.description: Name of a funder participating in a contracting process.

format.name: format
format.description: The format in whith results will be returned

procurement_method.name: procurement_method
procurement_method.description: Type of contracting process. Possible values direct, open, limited.

collection.name: collection
collection.description: Collection in which the object is

classification.name: classification
classification.description: Classification a way to differentiate several types of entities.

product_name.name: product_name
product_name.description: Filter contracts by product name or id

subclassification.name: subclassification
subclassification.description: Subclassification for persons, companies and institutions

Contract.description: A contracting process in an OCDS recordPackage
